column5: Here are a couple of pics.Did not take all that many this year.Most of mine were pics of Rich and Spiels dogs! Joe
last one.Wish I knew a better way to resize the pics witout loosing so much quality.
That belongs to Don(deg).It is unbelievable!Still smelled like a new boat inside. Joe
You're right, Don and Ruth's boat is one of the finest made boats I've ever seen. Just beautiful craftsmanship. Thanks for those pics Joe.
Don and Ruths boat is Huge Man!!
I had the pleasure of riding in Don's boat last week and it's without a doubt one of the most impressive fishing boats I've ever been in.
Good pictures, i like the Princecraft but thats just me
Joe... Use Photobucket for the pics and you're problems will go away..  that is one sweet ride!! Dang!  G
Nice pics Joe!  Deg's boat is built like a tank, I looked at them and was very impressed

Try the image resizer down near the bottom on the right. It works great for me. Just install it, right click on the picture you want to resize and presto...  http://www.microsoft.com/windowsxp/downloa...ppowertoys.mspx
Wondered where you had got to Joe !  Pic #2 Isnt that Glens Jet boat ? Is it rigged up for Parasailing now?  Sorry, could'nt resist that
Nice pics Joe...and a pleasure to see you again!  What?  My fine vessel didn't make your cut of great boats?  I've been insulted....LOL

Don and Ruth were very generous and offered me a spot in their boat during the pike Derby. I had a great time, even if I did lose a solid second place fish due to my own foolishness. The free board difference between my canoe and that beauty are significant to say the least.  Thanks guys.
That is a nice boat!   There is a dealer for similar boats in Barrie.  They are called Custom Weld boats and they are very impressive as well.
